rows.label: qst712001_msg0001
rows.name:
I knew you'd be back. Can't resist
a challenge, right?

rows.label: qst712001_msg0002
rows.name:
Like I said, I need to make sure my
Driver has capable allies to escort
him on this dangerous mission.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0003
rows.name:
So I'll have to ask you to do something
a little trickier than last time.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0004
rows.name: Here's what I want you to do...

rows.label: qst712001_msg0005
rows.name:
Basically, it's the same drill as before,
but now I need you to do five of your
finest three-stage Blade Combos.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0006
rows.name:
Like I said before, a Blade Combo is
a string of Specials, and the third stage
is not that different from the second.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0007
rows.name:
For the three stages, you'll need to use
a Special that's at least level 1, 2 and 3
respectively. That's the basic principle.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0008
rows.name:
And, since you've cleared my first trial,
let me tell you about critical routes
while you're here.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0009
rows.name:
A critical route is what we call a special
Blade Combo that follows a particular
element sequence.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0010
rows.name:
The one I know is Fire, Fire, then Light.
Do that one, and you'll deal much more
damage than with just a normal combo.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0011
rows.name:
But there are plenty of other critical
routes to discover. I'm hoping you'll
take this chance to experiment a little.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0012
rows.name:
Ah, don't worry though. Critical routes
aren't really part of today's test, so I
won't grade you on that.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0013
rows.name:
Basically, I don't really mind what
Blade Combos you pull off, as long
as you can reach the third stage.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0014
rows.name:
As before, you can pick the place,
time, and target.

rows.label: qst712001_msg0015
rows.name:
My ether abilities let me track your
movement, so there's no trouble in
that regard.
